remarks.para: One may be inoperative provided flight descends to FL290 or below if failure of the second indication occurs in flight.

note.para: In flight failure of the second indication requires descent to FL290 or below.

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on panel: "CAPT’s or F/O’s MACH IND INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
